Class Card

java.lang.Object
  it.polimi.provaFinale2013.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionCard, CharacterCard, MovementCard, StableOwnerCard
public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This abstract class manages the common characteristics to all the cards.
